books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Now grown up, Dan, the boy with psycho-intuitive powers in “The Shining,” helps another child with a spectacular gift.
books.name: DOCTOR SLEEP

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A journalist becomes a murder suspect as he pursues a story.
books.name: DEADLINE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read until after his death.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Jhumpa Lahiri
books.description: After his radical brother is killed, an Indian scientist brings his widow to join him in America.
books.name: THE LOWLAND

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher is thrown into jail on trumped-up charges and must clear his name.
books.name: NEVER GO BACK

books.author: by Abbi Glines
books.description: A beautifully imperfect stranger opens the eyes of a businessman to a new kind of future.
books.name: SIMPLE PERFECTION

books.author: by Lynsay Sands
books.description: Jake has barely had time to adjust to being a vampire before he’s roped into playing bodyguard to a beautiful artist.
books.name: ONE LUCKY VAMPIRE

books.author: by Sue Grafton
books.description: A homeless man inexplicably leaves $600,000 to Kinsey Millhone.
books.name: W IS FOR WASTED

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: In Fool’s Gold, Calif., a shop owner and an Army doctor can’t stop kissing under the mistletoe.
books.name: CHRISTMAS ON 4TH STREET

books.author: by Nelson DeMille
books.description: An elderly priest, recently escaped from an Ethiopian jail, is joined by two journalists in a search for a holy relic.
books.name: THE QUEST

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas searches for a young man who murdered his parents; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THANKLESS IN DEATH

books.author: by Jill Shalvis
books.description: After spoiling her big break on a reality cooking show, Leah returns home to Lucky Harbor, where she risks falling for her best friend, Jack.
books.name: ALWAYS ON MY MIND
